headline: Stocks to Watch Recap: Broadcom, Fastenal, JPMorgan, Warner Bros.
summary: ↗️ Broadcom (AVGO): U.S.-listed chip stocks such as TSMC (TSM) and AMD rebounded Monday after the Trump administration struck a conciliatory tone on China. Broadcom shares got an extra boost after the semiconductor designer struck a multibillion-dollar deal with OpenAI.

headline: Why Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of global entertainment and media company Warner Bros. Discovery (NASDAQ:WBD) jumped 4.6% in the afternoon session after the company rejected an initial takeover offer from Paramount Skydance and received a price target increase from Citigroup.

headline: Tracking the Narrative for Warner Bros. Discovery as Wall Street Reassesses Potential and Risks
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery stock has seen its fair value estimate raised from $15.10 to $18.27 per share, reflecting analysts’ growing optimism about the company’s outlook. This update comes as a result of stronger projections for revenue growth and a slight increase in perceived risk, as shown by the new discount rate. Stay tuned to find out how investors and observers can keep informed as the story and expectations for Warner Bros. Discovery continue to evolve. What Wall Street Has Been...
